descriptionHTML:
Sculpture Classic watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. Sculpture Classic Watch Face for business. Stylish & Elegant. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches.

Sculpture Classic Watch Face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ Battery level
✔ Ambient mode
✔ Day of the week
✔ Day of the month
✔ Display seconds

How to use Sculpture Classic Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the Sculpture Classic watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new Sculpture Classic Watch Face for Android Wear!

Follow us:
Google+ : https://plus.google.com/communities/110067937523867264256

More watchfaces:
FWF Market : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=bb.fwf.market
comments: For some reason my phone battery levels are not being updated
Like the simple it has and its clear view as well
Nice design and not buggy. I'd prefer the date (day) box in line with the 15 mins point, though. Nice to have complications option, too.
Great face, very reminiscent of Mondaine watches. The only request I would have is to have a dark option for the active face
